blog.name: hourglasscinnarose
blog.title: Apples Have Feelings
blog.description: There's a lot of stuff that do. Theories, headcannons, theme songs, drawings, tips, you name it, you could probably find it here. Well....If you name one of those things that I've already listed, then you'd probably find it here. Anyway! I think I speak for all apples when I say that they have feelings. Idk how long I'm able to make this.

summary: Okay, but what about the Slytherins that are super ambitious and passionate about saving the world? Like, one of them is...
body:
Okay, but what about the Slytherins that are super ambitious and passionate about saving the world? Like, one of them is addicted to growing trees because trees give us oxygen and they’re awesome or one that create animal resorts because they fell in love with animals and want to save all of them. Can you imagine how hilarious it would kind of sort of be to meet someone who’s entire life revolves around trees? Can you imagine explaining to your parents that you have a new best friend and then they ask what they’re like and your immediate though it ”They really like trees”. And then you have to be like, “They’re all about world peace and saving the environment.” even though their literal impression is that they’re tree smart and really passionate about them. And then you have to be forced to read all of the really cheesy “save the environment” Facebook Posts that they put up every day for YEARS. And when you’re in college you have to live with your quirky friend cleverly finding out how to write an allegory about saving the planet in their History Essay so that they can slowly change the mind of their teacher who doesn’t care about the environment at all. And when you visit them as an adult, they show you all of their plants that they have around their house because saving the world by planting trees fell flat and they needed a side job to help pay the rent and so gardening has become a major hobby. And in their own little way, they’re still able to at least feel like they’re saving the world. And you make them your children’s Godparent because even though they’re REALLY PERSISTENT about saving the world and plants and often accidentally scare potential friends away by telling them exactly how they think things should be and always being the one to stops people from killing the Spider, they’re still your best friend who’s always had good intentions.

Like, everyone is always like, “Slythrins want to become the government and take over the world and only Hufflepuffs can be seen as fluffy and quirky gardeners”, and then saying that “Only Ravenclaws would write allegories in their essays”. But, I don’t know, I just think a Slytherin, being ambitious and cunning, could still be able to do/be all those things without needing to be put into another House because it’s all about how they go about it. 

A Griffindor would protect their ideas to the end but would put it aside for things like, “People matter more than my passions”. And Hufflepuff would work hard for it everyday and even if they didn’t get what they wanted, they would still be happy that someone recognizes their work. And Ravenclaw trying to save the world would be someone passing on any information that they can to the people more in power because they know that they would be more successful.

But, I mean, I’m really sleep deprived and it’s four in the morning and I barely know what I’m typing, so maybe this is all really bad. XD

title: Addicting
body:
by lilylights

They had grazed this topic before, but always dancing around the edges of this shared experience. Shared trauma. After all, there is very few people who had housed Tom Riddle in their head.

summary: Haters: I don’t see how you can prefer Harry Potter to The Lord of the Rings. The cinematography... the story itself... the...
body:
Haters: I don’t see how you can prefer Harry Potter to The Lord of the Rings. The cinematography… the story itself… the acting… just everything! From my and any true critic’s point of view, Harry Potter doesn’t even compare!

Me:

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

trail.content:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

blog.description:
Jk Rowling who? Idk her.

All the characters are now queer poc and anyone who disagrees can fight me. I’m here for positivity about all the houses and running Snape over with my truck. Asks, messages, and submissions are super welcome!! I wanna interact with my followers!

Mod is a lesbian nonbinary slytherin if you were wondering. They/them pronouns please!

Also this is a sideblog. Main is @glitch-h Icon credit: @alessiajontrunfio

summary: houses as low quality pickup lines i just thot of
body:
houses as low quality pickup lines i just thot of

happy valentine’s day!

gryffindor:

- are you a glass vase? bc i wanna smash ya

- are you a parking ticket? bc you’re fine

hufflepuff:

- *after a sneeze* id say bless you but you’re clearly already blessed

- are you lung disease? because you take my breath away

slytherin:

- do you like national parks? because the grandest canyon is between your legs

- if i was a cat (kat), i’d spend lives number 3 and 7 with you

ravenclaw:

- we could be calculus but i’m only in precalc :(

- i’m potassium and you’re oxygen,, we would be a great bond, OK?

^^ ok that’s K2O but whatever,, also it’s highly reactive and unstable but science can take a hard left at exit 394

title: WHO NEEDS FRIENDS
description:
HARRY POTTER | DRACO AND HERMIONE (DRAMIONE)
RATED: Fiction M (+16) | Suggested Smut 
GENRE: Drama | Romance 
SUMMARY: Friends prove difficult as Hermione and Blaise start dating, especially his friends. Malfoy is particularly offended by Hermione’s presence on the scene.
STATUS: Complete

summary: How are you doing? I hope you're fine even though college is probably my hard. What are you majoring in? BTW you make some of my...
question: How are you doing? I hope you're fine even though college is probably my hard. What are you majoring in? BTW you make some of my favorite posts!
answer:
Heyyy!! Thankyou so much you have no idea what that means to me ❤️❤️ i am fine thankyou for asking! How are you? :)

I’ve finished my early years so I can be a nursery (kindergarten) teacher and now I’m currently doing art and design :)
